home.title: , I'm Maxime alias "Kayoshi "
home.speech:
Fullstack developer, I create innovative and ergonomic software solutions.
When I'm not coding, I travel all around the world 🛫

skills.title: My skills
skills.subtitle: As a developer, learning never ends, I stay constantly on the lookout for new things and technologies in order to progress and always go further... I am also interested in design in order to improve in this domain.
